title: [SOLVED]820-4924 no KB and TPAD
message:
liquid damaged machine, very little areas we're corroded a bit near the kb connector and a tiny bit near the trackpad connector and on the kb backlight.

The trackpad force touch actuates but no click is registered and no movement with keyboard only the power button and backlight works.

PP3V3_S4_TPAD measures 3.3v, no signs of corrosion near U4830 & U4820.

title: [SOLVED]820-4924 no KB and TPAD
message: i dont have another trackpad but i tried unplugging it and still no keyboard, also tried unplugging kb and still no tp

title: [SOLVED]820-4924 no KB and TPAD
message: Trackpad needs to be connected and working, otherwise keyboard will not work...

title: [SOLVED]820-4924 no KB and TPAD
message:
ow i did not know that, i'll order in a new trackpad and cable. Thank you

Is that the same for all retinas?

title: [SOLVED]820-4924 no KB and TPAD
message:
So its just the force touch ones that need the touchpad for the keyboard to work?

I'll check those corroded vias near the tpad connector

title: [SOLVED]820-4924 no KB and TPAD
message: Trackpad and cable first, only then mess with the board.

title: [SOLVED]820-4924 no KB and TPAD
message:
Tried with another tpad and cable, forgot i had a extra housing. Same problem.

TPAD_SPI_INT_L via looked dodgey and sure enough it wasnt making a connection. Patched it up and all working now.

Thanks for all your input, would have probably taken me a while to figure out tpad was needed for kb

title: [SOLVED]820-4924 no KB and TPAD
message:
Just noticed Left shift control and alt are not working. Tested with new keyboard same problem. 

Checked for gunk in connector and continuity from the connector to U4850 all is good, any ideas?

title: [SOLVED]820-4924 no KB and TPAD
message: the connector was not getting pp3v42 ran a wire and now all is good. Thanks again
